name: Introduction to Python Programming and Data Science
body:
### Welcome to the Bootcamp
This bootcamp is designed for Northwestern students who have little to none previous experience with programming. Through interactive instruction and project-based work we plan to teach you the basics of programming python and data analysis. To register for the bootcamp use the [EventBrite](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/introduction-to-programming-for-big-data-tickets-18194534342) page.

###Requirements
**You must have a current laptop with Windows or OS X.**
If it is a Windows laptop then it should have Windows 7, 8, or 8.1
If it is a Mac then it should have OS X 10.9 or 10.10
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
